welcome.paragraph:
Find out what you need,
 and also what you don't

header.title: Your Feel Good Level
header.body: The scores you gave during self-assesment are used to calculate an average fell good score.

subtitle.good: Factors that are on good track, keep going in this direction!
subtitle.normal: Ask yourself "How can I minimize the negative sides?" and change as priority 2
subtitle.bad: Ask yourself "WHY ?" and change as priority 1. You may need help from professionals to get out of the situation.

header.name:
Who has brought joy to you, 
who gave you negative waves?
